documents.document: @SkepticalHusky I'm only getting around to listening to this right now!! I does sound like Handel alright. :)
Didn't realise that Philip Glass is 80 today! Here's a favorite of mine: String Quartet no. 5: Mov.5 https://t.co/D3utzL6GR2
@RomaPete Dont forget about Schubert! Born 220 years ago today too. 😁
For Franz Schubert birthday here's a documentary I have found The Greatest Love and the Greatest Sorrow https://t.co/I4n02mPxZS #Schubert220
